item.title: China Map With Google and Autonavi
item.description: These days I am investigating the map used in Hongkong and China mainland since it uses the different standard according to Chinese law. There are some several interesting points can be discussed here: Chinese Coordinate System GCJ-02 vs GPS WGS-84 HongKong and Macau in Google Map GCJ-02 in Google Map How to check if a coordinate is in an closed region GeoJson data Pre-handling Extract the outermost border coordinates Checking if a coordinate is inside of a polygon China Mainland is swallowed by HongKong in the border Chinese Coordinate System GCJ-02 vs GPS WGS-84 Today most of the world uses the World Geodetic System WGS-84, where 84 is the latest vision of the standard applied in 1984.
